generated_text:
- road: The image shows a multi-lane road with white lane markings and traffic flowing in both directions.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are visible walking on a paved area next to the road, separated by a curb and railing, indicating a sidewalk.
- building: Large modern buildings with glass facades and multiple stories are visible in the background and to the sides of the road.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are visible along the sides of the road and in front of some buildings.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing clear and bright.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- car: Multiple cars are visible on the road, including a black sedan and a black SUV.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible hanging above the road, controlling traffic flow.
- traffic sign: A triangular "yield" sign is visible on a pole near the crosswalk.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- truck: A red van is visible parked on the side of the road, which can be classified as a truck.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible parked on the sidewalk near the right side of the image.
